creator: med1985@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 27220
Overlapping "J" and "o"

In this SVG font the "J" and "o" overlap. FO attached with "Joint" written in FOP #PCDATA and as SVG text.

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
This is not a FOP issue. This is a problem with the JVM not finding the appropriate font, silently falling back to a default font (SansSerif), whose metrics are incompatible with Helvetica.

To work around that problem you need to use a font that is both known by the JVM and configured in fop.xconf. Have a look here for more details:
http://markmail.org/message/obiwsaqa32ocd7qc

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
